Question
========

[[1]] assignment never creates a variable in the current environment, while [[2]] assignment always creates a variable in the current environment.

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------

* `<<-`, `<-`
* `<-`, `<<-`
* `<<-`, `%>%`
* `%>%`, `<-`
* `<-`, `%>%`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct
* No, it's the other way
* No, `%>%` is not an assignment operator.
* No, `%>%` is not an assignment operator.
* No, `%>%` is not an assignment operator.
